about_the_game:
Data that enables new officers for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV".
Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.

Six characters including Ryza and Klaudia will be available in "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" with their own unique "Traits"! Whether you choose to have them serve under an officer, or have them establish their own forces and defeat other heroes, the choice is yours. The alchemists will add flair to your adventure in the world of the Three Kingdoms.

▼Additional Officers
Ryza, Lent, Tao, Klaudia, Empel, Lila

▼How to Use
After selecting a scenario from "Start New->Select Scenario" screen, at the "Manage Orig. Officers" screen, use "Introduce Orig. Officer" to select an officer.
Use "Position Orig. Officers" to place these officers at locations of your choice.
detailed_description:
Data that enables new officers for "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV".
Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited.

Six characters including Ryza and Klaudia will be available in "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" with their own unique "Traits"! Whether you choose to have them serve under an officer, or have them establish their own forces and defeat other heroes, the choice is yours. The alchemists will add flair to your adventure in the world of the Three Kingdoms.

▼Additional Officers
Ryza, Lent, Tao, Klaudia, Empel, Lila

▼How to Use
After selecting a scenario from "Start New->Select Scenario" screen, at the "Manage Orig. Officers" screen, use "Introduce Orig. Officer" to select an officer.
Use "Position Orig. Officers" to place these officers at locations of your choice.

name: RTK14: "Ryza and Her Friends" Officer Data

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 Display required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch Surround, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 Display recommended

short_description: Six characters such as Ryza and Klaudia will be available in "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" with unique "Traits"! The alchemists will add flair to your adventure in the world of the Three Kingdoms.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
